Sentence.sentence: Increased inequality and decreasing mobility pose a fundamental threat to the American Dream, he said.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: They resonated(共鸣) with optimism and ambition in much the same way as the most famous dream speech of all, delivered by Martin Luther King Jr.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: On the flip side, companies like Virgin Galactic are plotting a bottom-up assault on the space dream by making it a reality to the public
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It sounded very much like a dream.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It made an ancient dream come true
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: And yet in many ways the two dreams ended up at odds with each other.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The space dreamers end up benefiting all of us—not just because of the way they expand human knowledge, or because of the spin-off technologies they produce, but because the two types of dreams feed off each other
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: it takes patience for humans to realize their dreams
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Studies show that more and more poor and non-white students want to graduate from college – but their graduation rates fall far short of their dreams.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: First on her agenda was to pursue her dream of hosting a pop music programme.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: "Increased inequality and decreasing mobility pose a fundamental threat to the American Dream," he said.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: However, when you know you can look forward to working in your dream job, you'll be glad you thought it through.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: If I want to continue ahead with this dream of only my own business, I have no other choice.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: It literally is like something in a dream to remember what it's like to actually be able to go out and put in a day's work and receive a day's pay.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Let's face it, it wasn't too long ago that the idea of working from anywhere and at anytime was some form of a distant utopian dream,and yet now we can perform almost any office-based task from any location in the world as long as we have access to the in
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: My dream is to become an online celebrity of sorts.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Over the next few months, I realized not only could I not afford my dream school, I couldn't even afford the ones where I'd been accepted.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The dream of personalised flight is still vivid in the minds of many inventors, some developing cycle-powered craft, others pouring money into jetpacks(喷气飞行背包).
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: They are seen as abandoning both modern 34 conveniences and the American dream of success and progress.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Today I'm going to talk about Germany's dream airport in Berlin.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: We often hear people say that America is a land of opportunity, a country built on hope to aspire to greatness on the American Dream.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: You dream about being a movie star.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

word_mean: 梦：睡眠时出现的一种精神现象，此时影象、情绪与思想都具有真实感。做梦发生于快速动眼相(REM)睡眠。这种睡眠相一夜有四、五次，总持续时间约90分钟。Freud首创从心理学解释梦，认为梦是受抑制的无意识冲动与愿望的有意识表现

Sentence.sentence: Although they began with a small restaurant, they had big dreams, and they worked together.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语安徽卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Anxiously I went to bed dreaming about what I would find at the top of this magical mountain.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: Building up a dream team is more complex than simply hiring the best talent.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: But every day, we would sit by the lake, looking at the house and dreaming of what it would be like to live there.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: But never ever give up on your dream! Never let anyone tell you, "you can't".
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: Daydreams are often very simple and direct, quite unlike sleep dreams, which may be hard to understand.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 单项填空 选项

Sentence.sentence: Dreaming about whether you would want to read minds, see through walls, or have superhuman strength may sound silly, but it actually gets to the heart of what really matters in your life.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: He was offering a way for us to change our lives and achieve our dreams.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: His words freed me from my bad dreams.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷3 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: However doctor grand adds, that some people will hesitate, because they don't actually believe they can make it happen, while others will rush into downshifting to discover that their dream ends up with the financial crisis.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: I'd skipped nearby Guilin, a dream place for tourists seeking the limestone mountain tops and dark waters of the Li river which are pictured by artists in so many Chinese paintings.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷1 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: It's been her dream for a long time.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: It's not just the dream of the young.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Look over the "city of dreaming spires" from St Mary's church tower.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Many young people, most of whom were well-educated, headed for remote regions to chase their dreams.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Middle-aged homemakers, retirees, and the unemployed come to such cafes to talk about love, anger, and dreams with a psychologist.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Now Alia waited for the war to end and dreamed of peace and a new library.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: One of the very best varieties for eating quality is Orleans Reinette, but you'll need a warm, sheltered place with perfect soil to grow it, so it's a pipe dream for most apple lovers who fall for it.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: So, always try to live a little bit beyond your abilities—and you'll find your abilities are greater than you ever dreamed.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Some people live only dreaming about it while others live to avoid ever climbing at all.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: Still we must climb and dream about what's at the top of our mountain.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: The cars that drove the American dream have helped to create a global ecological disaster.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: The possibility of self-driving robot cars has often seemed like a futurist's dream, years away from materializing in the real world.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: They help people realize their dreams.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读D 选项

Sentence.sentence: Two years ago, while cathy was watching the Olympics, a dream came into her sweet little head—to be a swimmer.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: We have entered into an age when dreams have the best chance of coming true.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: We went 10-1 and I was named most valuable player, but I often had crazy dreams in which I was to blame for Miller's accident.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷3 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Whatever our circumstances, we generally still have dreams, hopes and desires—that little something more we want for ourselves and our loved ones.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语福建卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: When he selects news of the other kind, he usually withdraws from the world of threatening reality toward the dream world.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 任务型阅读 原文

Sentence.sentence: Young models selling dreams to the world.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读B 选项

Sentence.sentence: Your lives are busy enough doing homework, playing sports, making friends, seeking after your dreams.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: You are the lucky inheritor of a dream come true.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In previous eras of drastic technological change, entrepreneurs smoothed the transition by dreaming up ways to combine labor and machines.
Sentence.come: 出自-2018年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: At the very least, it has awoken us from our national fever dream of easy riches and bigger houses, and put a necessary end to an era of reckless personal spending.
Sentence.come: 2012年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

jx.jx_en_mean: used in spoken English to assert that something much desired is not likely ever to happen
[with negative]used to emphasize that a situation is beyond the scope of one's imagination

lj.lj_ly: she could never in her wildest dreams have imagined the summer weather in New York.

lj.lj_ly: the car is still running like a dream.

lj.lj_ly: Dean thinks he's going to get the job. Dream on, Babe.

lj.lj_ly: dreamed up a plan to corner the market.
lj.lj_ls: 构想出一个计划来垄断市场

entry.def: A dream is an imaginary series of events that you experience in your mind while you are asleep.

example.ex: He had a dream about Claire...
example.tran: 他梦见了克莱尔。

example.ex: I had a dream that I was in an old study, surrounded by leather books.
example.tran: 我梦见我在一间古老的书房里,四周全是皮装书。

entry.def: When you dream, you experience imaginary events in your mind while you are asleep.

example.ex: Ivor dreamed that he was on a bus...
example.tran: 艾弗梦见他在一辆公共汽车上。

example.ex: She dreamed about her baby.
example.tran: 她梦见了她的宝宝。

entry.def: You can refer to a situation or event as a dream if you often think about it because you would like it to happen.

example.ex: He had finally accomplished his dream of becoming a pilot...
example.tran: 他最终实现了成为一名飞行员的梦想。

example.ex: My dream is to have a house in the country...
example.tran: 我梦想在乡间拥有一栋房子。

entry.def: If you often think about something that you would very much like to happen or have, you can say that you dream of it.

example.ex: As a schoolgirl, she had dreamed of becoming an actress...
example.tran: 她上学时曾梦想成为一名女演员。

example.ex: For most of us, a brand new designer kitchen is something we can only dream about...
example.tran: 对我们大多数人来说,一间崭新的由著名设计师设计的厨房只能是一种梦想。

entry.def: You can use dream to describe something that you think is ideal or perfect, especially if it is something that you thought you would never be able to have or experience.
entry.tran: 理想的;梦幻般的;完美的

example.ex: He had his dream house built on the banks of the river Bure.
example.tran: 他在布尔河畔建造了他的梦幻屋。

example.ex: ...a dream holiday to Jamaica.
example.tran: 牙买加梦幻之旅

entry.def: If you describe something as a particular person's dream, you think that it would be ideal for that person and that he or she would like it very much.
entry.tran: 理想;夙愿;梦寐以求的事物

example.ex: Greece is said to be a botanist's dream...
example.tran: 据说希腊是植物学家梦寐以求的地方。

example.ex: He's every girl's dream!
example.tran: 他是所有姑娘的梦中情人！

entry.def: If you say that something is a dream, you mean that it is wonderful.
You can refer to a situation or event that does not seem real as a dream, especially if it is very strange or unpleasant.

example.ex: When the right woman comes along, this bad dream will be over.
example.tran: 当有合适的女人出现时,这种胡思乱想就会停止了。

entry.def: If you say that you would not dream of doing something, you are emphasizing that you would never do it because you think it is wrong or is not possible or suitable for you.

example.ex: I wouldn't dream of making fun of you...
example.tran: 我绝不会取笑你。

example.ex: My sons would never dream of expecting their clothes to be ironed.
example.tran: 我的几个儿子从不指望别人帮他们熨好衣服。

entry.def: If you say that you never dreamed that something would happen, you are emphasizing that you did not think that it would happen because it seemed very unlikely.

example.ex: I never dreamed that I would be able to afford a home here...
example.tran: 我从没想到我在这儿能买得起房子。

example.ex: Who could ever dream of a disaster like this?...
example.tran: 谁能想到会发生这样的灾难？

entry.def: If you tell someone to dream on, you mean that something they are hoping for is unlikely to happen.

example.ex: 'Perhaps one day I may go on a relaxing holiday.' — 'Yeah, dream on.'
example.tran: “也许有一天我可以享受一个放松身心的假期。”——“是啊,你就做梦吧。”

entry.def: If you say that you are in a dream, you mean that you do not concentrate properly on what you are doing because you are thinking about other things.

example.ex: All day long I moved in a dream.
example.tran: 整整一天我都心不在焉。

entry.def: If you say that someone does something like a dream, you think that they do it very well. If you say that something happens like a dream, you mean that it happens successfully without any problems.
entry.tran: 梦幻般地;美妙地;完美地

example.ex: She cooked like a dream...
example.tran: 她烹饪技艺精湛。

example.ex: His ship had sailed like a dream.
example.tran: 他的船行驶十分顺畅。

entry.def: If you describe someone or something as the person or thing of your dreams, you mean that you consider them to be ideal or perfect.

example.ex: This could be the man of my dreams.
example.tran: 这就是我理想中的男子。

entry.def: If you say that you could not imagine a particular thing in your wildest dreams, you are emphasizing that you think it is extremely strange or unlikely.
entry.tran: （强调极为奇怪或完全不可能）再怎么想也

example.ex: Never in my wildest dreams did I think we could win.
example.tran: 我做梦也没想到我们会赢。

entry.def: If you describe something as being beyond your wildest dreams, you are emphasizing that it is better than you could have imagined or hoped for.
entry.tran: 超出想象的;比希望中要好的

example.ex: She had already achieved success beyond her wildest dreams.
example.tran: 她已经取得超乎想象的成功。

means.word_mean: 1. a series of mental images and emotions occurring during sleep;

sentences.sentence: "I had a dream about you last night"

means.word_mean: 2. a cherished desire;

sentences.sentence: "his ambition is to own his own business"

means.word_mean: 3. imaginative thoughts indulged in while awake;

sentences.sentence: "he lives in a dream that has nothing to do with reality"

means.word_mean: 4. a fantastic but vain hope (from fantasies induced by the opium pipe);

sentences.sentence: "I have this pipe dream about being emperor of the universe"

means.word_mean: 5. a state of mind characterized by abstraction and release from reality;

sentences.sentence: "he went about his work as if in a dream"

means.word_mean: 6. someone of something wonderful;
1. have a daydream; indulge in a fantasy
2. experience while sleeping;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: of Germanic origin, related to Dutch droom and German Traum, and probably also to Old English drēam 'joy, music'

sentences.cn: 梦想已经成真，而你就是梦想成真的幸运继承者。

sentences.cn: 当然，年轻的理想主义者常常很勇敢，没有人愿意放弃梦想。

sentences.cn: 当好学生上交了一篇短文，他们梦想的是，导师交还给他们的时候，短文只字未改，除却在末页空白处加上的一个批语： “完美”。
sentences.en: When good students  turn in an essay, they dream of their instructor returning it to them in exactly the same condition,  save for a single word added in the  margin of the final page:  “Flawless.”

sentences.cn: 有一天我的梦想会实现.

sentences.en: Volunteer teachers have a dream that all children, rich or poor, will receive equal education.

sentences.en: ‘I'll be a manager before I'm 30. ’ ‘In your dreams. ’

sentences.en: Never in my wildest dreams did I think we could win.

sentences.en: Psychiatrist Stephen LaBerge is an expert on lucid dreaming.

sentences.cn: 在其他期间叫醒他们,则说没有做梦.

sentences.en: In England they hardly ever lie, but they would not dream of telling you the truth.

sentences.en: In England they hardly ever lie, but they would not dream of telling you the truth.

sentences.en: I never dream that I would spend my old age in such comfort and happiness.

sentences.en: They would not dream of proposing such legislation for guns that fire real bullets.

sentences.cn: 他做梦也从未想到会出现这种状况.

sentences.en: Whenever their dreams and reality don't match, if they can't solve their problems, they attempt suicide.

sentences.cn: 他当医生的愿望实现了.
sentences.en: His dream of being a doctor has come true.

sentences.cn: 王后: 是的.只要尝一口,你的所有愿望就会实现.
sentences.en: Queen: Yes. One bite and all your dreams will come true.

sentences.cn: 他要满足自己双亲从未实现的梦想和愿望.
sentences.en: He is to fulfill those dreams and wishes of his parents which they never carried out.

sentences.cn: 重回战场杀敌是每一个办公室帝国卫兵最大的愿望!
sentences.en: Returing to the battlefield is the ultimate dream of every office storm trooper!

sentences.cn: 被捕的愿望仅仅是美梦一个, 那个岛子是太遥远了.
sentences.en: Arrest seemed but a rosy dream . The Island seemed very far away.

sentences.cn: 每个人都有梦想,希望和愿望.
sentences.en: You have dreams and hopes and desires.

sentences.cn: 我们同属一个世界,我们有相同的愿望和梦想.
sentences.en: We belong to the same world and we share the same aspirations and dreams.

sentences.cn: 我把全部的精力和时间都花费在实现第二个愿望上.
sentences.en: I pouring all my time and energy to let my another dream come true.

sentences.cn: 我的愿望是和爸妈一起去迪斯尼乐园游玩.
sentences.en: And my dream is playing in the Disneyland with my parents.

sentences.cn: 在我心中,一直有一个愿望,那就是能见上我的爷爷一面.
sentences.en: There always had a dream in my heart that I could see my grandpa one day.

sentences.cn: 在同一时间, 支持你的伴侣在追求和实现自己的愿望和梦想.
sentences.en: At the same time, support your partner in pursuing and fulfilling their own desires and dreams.

sentences.cn: 她把该梦理解为一种想再年轻的无意识的愿望.
sentences.en: She interprets the dream as an unconscious desire to be young again.

sentences.cn: 国富民强是中国人民的共同愿望.
sentences.en: The Chinese people all share the same dream, that the nation and people will be powerful.

sentences.cn: 他的愿望总是模模糊糊的.
sentences.en: His dreams were always vague.

sentences.cn: 与你躺在星辰遍布的夜空下看星星,我的愿望已成真!
sentences.en: Lying here, with you, under the starry sky already a dream come true!

sentences.cn: 我的愿望都是梦 ( 许个心愿 )?
sentences.en: What I thought was a dream ( make a wish )?

sentences.cn: 我有一个愿望, 飞往绿色的海港; 那是梦中的天堂.
sentences.en: I have a hope, to fly to a green seaport, that is paradise in my dream.

sentences.cn: 如果只有愿望可以变成梦想.
sentences.en: If only wishes coul be dreams.

sentences.cn: 它其实是一个梦想和愿望的储存库, 还承载着几代犹太人的艰辛努力.
sentences.en: It is the repository of dreams, prayers and efforts of generations of Jews.

sentences.cn: 这些科学家们相信,梦大多数是对不可能实现的愿望的一种表达.
sentences.en: They that dreams are mostly expressions of wishes that did not come true.

sentences.cn: 他们可以表现人的社会身份, 他们喜好, 他的愿望, 理想, 还有许多.
sentences.en: They can represent a person's social status, his and dislikes, his hopes, dreams, and so on.

sentences.cn: 我们都有自己要追求的人生，自己要编织的梦想，我们都有能力实现愿望，只要我们持续相信。（Louisa May Alcott）
sentences.en: We all have our own life to pursue, our own kind of dream to be weaving, and we all have the power to make wishes come true, as long as we keep believing.

sentences.cn: 他说：“不平等的增强和流动性的减弱对于美国梦的实现是一个巨大的挑战。”
sentences.en: “ Increased inequality and decreasing mobility pose a fundamental threat to the American Dream, ” he said.

sentences.en: A hundred years ago, a newspaper in Tianjin , carried an article about China's Olympic dream.
